content: पुष्पित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Flowered, full of flowers, in bloom, blooming; चिरविरहेण विलोक्य पुष्पिताग्रां <ls>Gīt. 4</ls> (where पुष्पिताग्रा is also the name of a metre). {@--2@} Florid, flowery (as speech). {@--3@} Abounding or rich in; as in सुवर्णपुष्पितां पृथ्वीं <ls>Pt. 1. 45</ls> {@--4@} Fully developed, completely manifested. {@--5@} Spotted, variegated --ता A woman in her courses.
